title: Card, "Design for Happy Holidays postcard for Sara Belle Lustig", 1938
medium: Lithography in black, grey, purple and coral ink on white wove paper
inscribed: Printed in black ink, left center: SARA BELLE LUSTIG; upper right: HAPPY HOLIDAYS.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description:
Page divided into 2 vertical registers: 1/3 wide white, 2/3 white dark salmon pink. 
Two lines of text face eachother diagonally and form a downward pointing triangular shape. 
Lower half of page: dark purple and light purple pinwheel shapes in various sizes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Card, "Design for Happy Holidays postcard for Sara Belle Lustig", 1938.
1938. Lithography in black, grey, purple and coral ink on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-158.
